body_html:
so if i changed some layer names or for example i want to split the sequential in pretrained VGG and load the pretrained parameters, what shoud i do?
in version 0.2 i cant assign the value of state_dict according to index if the order of layer isnt change.
but in version0.3 you use odict which cant be assigned as before...
body_text:
so if i changed some layer names  or for example i want to split the sequential in pretrained VGG and load the pretrained parameters, what shoud i do?
in version 0.2 i cant assign the value of state_dict according to index if the order of layer isnt change.
but in version0.3 you use odict which cant be assigned as before...
body:
so if i changed some layer names  or for example i want to split the sequential in pretrained VGG and load the pretrained parameters, what shoud i do?
in version 0.2 i cant assign the value of state_dict according to index if the order of layer isnt change.
but in version0.3 you use odict which cant be assigned as before...
